item.title: Veterinary hospital explodes after car hits gas line, North Carolina police say
item.description: A veterinary hospital under construction exploded after a car hit the gas line that fed into the building in Wilmington

item.title: Travis Decker search: DNA analysis indicates father is sole suspect in 3 killings
item.description: As the search for Travis Decker has almost reached the three-month mark, officials are revealing disturbing new details about the crime scene.

item.title: Trump: Smithsonian should portray nation's 'Brightness,' not 'how bad Slavery was'
item.description: President Trump confirmed the White House is doing a review Smithsonian museums, where he complained "everything discussed is how horrible our Country...

item.title: WATCH: Driver smashes through window as food influencers film restaurant review
item.description: A pair of food influencers escaped without major injuries after a driver accidentally plowed through a restaurant in Houston over the weekend.

item.title: LIVE: ABC News Live
item.description: 24/7 coverage of breaking news and live events
